category: Sports Instructor Qualification Committee Regulations/Article 6 (Duties of Committee Members)
contents: Article 6 (Duties of members) ① The chairperson represents the committee and supervises its work. ② The vice-chairperson shall assist the chairperson and perform the duties on behalf of the chairperson if the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons. If the vice-chairman is also unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons, the vice-chairman shall perform the duties on his/her behalf in the order of seniority among the members. You can. ③ Members form a committee and attend the committee to deliberate on matters related to their duties.
